name: Teeny Tanks (RoloJo)
description:
The naughty Teeny Tanks are on the march, attempting to cross your corn field. This cannot be allowed, rise up and crush their lack of consideration!

Using colour-coded weapons and special abilities you will halt the march of the Teeny Tanks. Row after row of tanks will fall to your bravery as you manage your levels of ammunition. But, beware, the Teeny Tank army has its own tricks that it will use in an effort to drive over your corn fields and flatten your dignity!
